techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster

techs.name: Sailing
techs.quote: 'He who commands the sea has command of everything.' - Themistocles
uniques: Embarkation (Allows all standard Land Units to traverse Coast Terrain)

techs.name: Pottery
techs.quote: 'Shall the clay say to him that fashioneth it, what makest thou?' - Bible Isaiah 45:9

techs.name: Animal Husbandry
techs.quote: 'Thou shalt not muzzle the ox when he treadeth out the corn.' - Bible Deuteronomy 25:4

techs.name: Writing
techs.quote: 'He who destroys a good book kills reason itself.' - John Milton

techs.name: Irrigation
techs.quote: 'So teach us to number our days, so that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.' - Bible Psalms 90:12

techs.name: Masonry
techs.quote: 'How happy are those whose walls already rise!' - Virgil

techs.name: Currency
techs.quote: 'Better is bread with a happy heart than wealth with vexation.' - Amenemope

techs.name: Bronze Working
techs.quote: 'Here Hector entered, with a spear eleven cubits long in his hand; the bronze point gleamed in front of him, and was fastened to the shaft of the spear by a ring of gold.' - Homer

techs.name: The Wheel
techs.quote: 'Wisdom and virtue are like the two wheels of a cart.' - Japanese proverb

techs.name: Navigation
techs.quote: 'The winds and the waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.' - Edward Gibbon

techs.name: Engineering
techs.quote: 'Instrumental or mechanical science is the noblest and, above all others, the most useful.' - Leonardo da Vinci

techs.name: Military Training
techs.quote: 'Wars may be fought with weapons, but they are won by men. It is the spirit of the men who follow and of the man who leads that gains the victory.' - George S. Patton

techs.name: Mathematics
techs.quote: 'Mathematics is the gate and key to the sciences.' - Roger Bacon

techs.name: Iron Working
techs.quote: 'Do not wait to strike til the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.' - William Butler Yeats

techs.name: Future Tech 1
techs.quote: 'I think we agree, the past is over.' - George W. Bush
uniques: A boost for starting Tech in the next Age

techs.name: Machinery
techs.quote: 'The machine does not isolate man from the great problems of nature but plunges him more deeply into them.' - Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry

techs.name: Astronomy
techs.quote: 'Astronomy compels the soul to look upwards and leads us from this world to another.' - Plato

techs.name: Cartography
techs.quote: 'Cartography is the science of the gods.' - Anonymous
uniques: All Civilian and Support Units may enter deep Ocean Terrain

techs.name: Castles
techs.quote: 'A man's home is his castle.' - Sir Edward Coke

techs.name: Heraldry
techs.quote: 'Heraldry is the shorthand of history.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Feudalism
techs.quote: 'Feudalism, as it was, is a thing of the past.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Shipbuilding
techs.quote: 'Shipbuilding is the cradle of civilization.' - Anonymous
uniques: All Naval Units can safely travel across deep Ocean Terrain without taking damage
All units ignore movement penalties from deep Ocean Terrain

techs.name: Guilds
techs.quote: 'Guilds were the medieval equivalent of trade unions.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Metallurgy
techs.quote: 'Metallurgy is the key to civilization.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Education
techs.quote: 'Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.' - Nelson Mandela

techs.name: Metal Casting
techs.quote: 'Metal casting is the backbone of modern industry.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Architecture
techs.quote: 'Architecture is the learned game, correct and magnificent, of forms assembled in the light.' - Le Corbusier

techs.name: Gunpowder
techs.quote: 'Gunpowder is the emblem of modernity.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Urban Planning
techs.quote: 'Urban planning is the art of giving shape, design, and structure to cities and towns.' - Anonymous

techs.quote: 'The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.' - Eleanor Roosevelt

techs.quote: 'Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.' - Nelson Mandela

techs.name: Steam Engine
techs.quote: 'The steam engine has done much more for science than science has done for the steam engine.' - William Thomson

techs.quote: 'The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.' - Sun Tzu

techs.name: Electricity
techs.quote: 'Electricity is really just organized lightning.' - George Carlin

techs.name: Urbanization
techs.quote: 'Urbanization is not just modernizing the city; it is modernizing the people.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Combustion
techs.quote: 'The internal combustion engine is one of the most extraordinary things ever invented.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Industrialization
techs.quote: 'Industrialization is the systemic change that transforms an agrarian society into an industrial one.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Radio
techs.quote: 'Radio is the theater of the mind.' - Anonymous

techs.name: Flight
techs.quote: 'The engine is the heart of an airplane, but the pilot is its soul.' - Walter Raleigh

techs.name: Mobilization
techs.quote: 'Mobilization is the key to victory.' - Anonymous
